channel.title: Using hamachi... Problems
channel.description:
Mkay like my 188th post here I believe lol. I think 127 was posts to benefit ppl and the others topics I made. heh. Anyways does anyone have any idea how to get Hamachi to work as a no-ip and how would i go about getting it free. i used a trial and my trials up and i only used it once about 5 months ago when I first began. I would like to figure Hamachi out because I can't use my router no more, it crashes each time I get too many players. I'm planning to bring my old server back if I can ever get this thing working. :\
<3 all help i can get My msn should be memorized by now but why not: John_95_072hotmail.com

item.title: Using hamachi... Problems
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

www.hamachi.cc

dont worry when it says your trial is expired. that means nothing. you can still have all of the member benefits XD

Read full topic
